name: Polar Metal
desc4: Increase the DMG of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct> by 20%. When any squad member inflicts <ct color=#98EFF0>Freeze</ct> or <ct color=#98EFF0>Shatter</ct>, this effect increases by an additional 20% for 12s.
story: A Drive Disc burned with specialized Ether technology offering personalized attribute amplification to the user.
